list_definition.definition: the reason for doing something; the aim to which an action etc is directed

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What is the purpose of your visit?

list_definition.definition: the use or function of an object

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The purpose of this lever is to stop the machine in an emergency.
